评论详情: I first used this robe in a spa in Cabo, and was obsessed. After returning to Cabo again this year I knew I needed it. I love how log and big it is, but still holds warmth and feels soft against your skin. The huge pockets are a bonus too. I bought the grey and love love it.

评论概述: This robe is oversized as stated so pay close attention to the size you need.
评论详情: What I like about this robe…it is very soft and warm. I like the looser style to fit over pajamas and keep me warm on these chilly nights.  However, I did not give this robe 5 stars because I feel the sizing is inaccurate.  All of the models in the sizing guides are well above average height  (in US about 5’3”) and other than one, they are all very slender.  The robe is pictured as calf length.  I am short (5’2”) and not slender.  I ordered the size based on the guides wanting a loose fitting robe that would wrap around me and that would be ankle length on me.The robe meets those criteria…ankle length and wraps comfortably around my larger middle.  However, the arms are ridiculously long….at least 5” beyond my finger tips. Just because I am short and my middle has grown does not mean my arms are any longer than they were 50 pounds ago.  I will need to have the sleeves shortened, as there is way too much fabric there to roll up.Overall I am happy with the robe and the color, material, and quality of it.  I recommend that before you buy, double check your sizing to avoid disappointment.
So comfortable!

I was very disappointed. The robe was far too big, and very heavy. Unfortunately it’s going to charity,  because I had already washed it and can’t return it.  Having just returned a different robe (same size, different manufacturer) that was way too small, I just thought I would get used to it. Too big is better than too small in a robe, but this is just too much.  .
Well-made and washes well too. The size could be an issue as even the small size is too big for me, but will keep it as it is warm.
Beautiful warm

Microfiber outside & baby terrycloth inside, so it's a nice heavy robe, but it's not sewn together. Unless you get a hold of the top or hem the thing is in a jumbled heap. They layers need to be sewn together so it's not such a faff to use, and it keeps it's shape.

First the sizing ws way off.  Way too large.This was a gift to my wife ans she was not impressed.Thought the product was from walmart and suggested i take it back abd go get a better quality product from Target. Not a high quality product.  The value was not there / looks and feels like a $20 robe.  Apparently i paid too much

I bought this lovely soft robe for my 91 year old step mother. She opened it at Christmas put it on promptly and didn’t take it off until she was taken home. I would call that a pretty good testimonial. She loved it.
very nice

I opened this robe and immediately put it on and I am so glad I bought it. Is soft on the outside soft on the inside, comforting and comfortable. I am 55 150 pounds and the large fit perfect. I highly recommend this robe it is midweight not light not heavy. This is a perfect gift or a treat for yourself! I was just on a cruise and fell in love with the robes in the cabin and this robe is just like it. I’m so glad I found it! Yeah

I recently purchased the Terry Plush Bathrobe, and I am absolutely in love with it! From the moment I slipped it on, I could tell it was a step above other bathrobes I've owned. The plush microfiber fabric is incredibly soft and feels like a warm hug every time I wear it.  The quality is outstanding—sturdy stitching, a well-designed belt, and deep pockets that are perfect for keeping my hands warm or carrying small items around the house. It's both cozy and lightweight, which makes it ideal for year-round use.  Length is nice—it’s long enough to provide full coverage without feeling bulky or restrictive. The style is elegant, so I feel put-together even when lounging at home.  One of the standout features is how well it absorbs moisture after a shower. It dries quickly, leaving no damp or uncomfortable feeling.  Highly recommend!
This robe is so comfy and feels so luxurious! Whenever you go to nice hotels/spas and they have the best robes and it seems impossible to find one like it, well this is that robe! I love it!
Super large

I am 5'8" and the length is 3" above my ankles. The sleeves need to rolled up about three turns as they reach to the end of my fingertips. Comfy robe, I love it. Belt stays put, robe washes well, doesn't pill.

The description for this robe said that it was oversized. They are correct. However, it's SIGNIFICANTLY oversized. I'm 5'8" and 135 pounds. My arms are long. I purchased a Medium. The arms are so long that I would have to roll the sleeves multiple times. Additionally, there is no shape to the robe so it's not flattering at all. I also didn't like the sateen fabric on the outside. It felt sticky and not silky like sateen usually feels. I am returning the product.
I wanted a terry cloth robe - this robe material very heavey/bulky & terry cloth only on inside - disappointed  & will be returning item

It was a promising robe but overall a few big problems. First, it’s massively oversized. I’m 5’4, 145lbs and even in the Small I’m absolutely swimming in it. The shoulder seams are halfway down my arms looking super sloppy, arm pit is a good 8-9” below my actual arm pit, just too oversized and unisex feeling. That said, the material and lining are great, heavy without being too much, robe stays closed nicely. Just wish the fit was better and less unisex
It feels so luxurious. I feel like im in a spa every time I put it on. Great value. I like the weight and warmth, but good for summer temperatures too
My robe is perfect
Perfect spa robe. Not to heavy or light. Soft and comfy. I love it 👍
I am disappointed to find out I paid $80 for an 100% polyester cloak. It feels nice now that it is still new, but I know that this will not last.
Very soft. Washes nice

评论概述: This robe holds the body heat in just right
评论详情: I originally bought this robe from a resort in Washington state 5 years ago and it has held up great through wear and stains (come out every time).  I love that robe but needed another for a vacation home.  I wear mine from Fall to Spring and I feel wrapped in warmth by the soft outer layer of micro-fiber; and because of that I can keep my heat down. Try it, it works.  I've never tested the absorbency. The weight is distributed equally over the robe so you won't feel dragged down like a thick terry robe. In fact, I have one of those that hasn't been worn since I started wearing my Boca Terry. Buy one, you won't regret it.

评论概述: Luxurious Comfort and Nice Sizing - Perfect for Relaxation!!
评论详情: I just bought the Women’s Microfiber Robe by Boca Terry and I couldn’t be happier with my choice! From the moment I put it on, I felt like I was wrapped in luxury. The microfiber material is incredibly soft and comfortable. It’s a great robe for lounging around the house or enjoying a spa day at home. I felt like I had a good amount of room in the robe to move around without feeling weighted down or too bulky. I really like the deep pockets to put my phone and glasses in. Exceptional robe quality like what you would find at a first class hotel or spa. :)
I love the quality of this robe and the softness of the microfiber! I ordered this as a gift, but i love the grey color so much, I am going to keep for myself and order another for the gift.

评论概述: Luxurious and cozy- I absolutely love it!

The fabric is dreamy!  This robe feels so expensive but it’s very reasonably priced for the quality you’re getting.  Excellent purchase!!
They use these robes at my favorite spa but the only have the medium for purchase and that is too big. This fits and feels perfect. Shipping and seller were great. Everything as described!!!

评论概述: Less plush than what’s at hotels
评论详情: We fell in love with these robes when staying at the Waldorf Astoria, so I ordered them immediately. Unfortunately, these are far less plush as what we had at the hotel. This inside isn’t soft.
lining should be softer than outer fabric
Nice but not at the price.

For the price point, it’s definitely not worth it. The dry cloth lining is very thin, scratchy and barely sewn on. The stitching is done kind of awkwardly with high pockets and boxy sleeves, plus there is absolutely zero absorbency. I have a bob cut and not a lot of hair, it was wrapped up in a turban and I still felt like the robe was soaked after my shower.  I wanted something luxurious I could wear after a shower or lounging around going through my nightly routine. I would have kept it if it was closer to the $30 mark and if I wanted to have something cheap on hand. But the cost is disproportionate to the quality. I don’t know where all these positive reviews are coming from, but it might be fine if you just wanted something simple to wear as an added later. The colour is nice, but it arrived very wrinkled. I genuinely thought I was sent the wrong item at first cause kr looked a bit like a trench coat. I returned it immediately.
It very elegant and feel nice.
This robeis so warm and comfortable. It is the best thing on a cold day made very well. The quality is great. I love this robe will buy another in a different color.

Oh, I just love how soft the fabric is!  Like wearing a cloud!
Arrived first with stains in it.  Will be returning.

I bought one about a decade ago from the company. I just loved it, so was delighted to see it available here for a better price. I love the terry inner layer directly after a shower. I also love the silky smooth outer layer. It runs large, and I love that too. It’s just so cozy and feels very spa-like. I also love the weight of it.  It’s definitely heavier than a one-layer cotton or terry or silk robe. Great buy.

评论概述: High quality, just what I have been looking for

For work we order Boca Terry robes for our vacation homes, so I gave them a try for a personal robe; it absolutely did not disappoint. As a matter of fact I was so impressed with this robe that I bought one for my boyfriend, my son and his girlfriend for Christmas.
I love this robe it is very comfortable and just the right weight for me. It has a towel feel on the inside while being soft and smooth on the outside. It is a spa robe.

评论概述: Soft and warm. Much shorter than pic

All the robes I looked like were too short. so I thought I would pay more for the long length modeled on the page. The seller should fix this. Hence 4 stars for misleading image.

I was really hoping to love this robe, but it is made as two layers. One soft outer layer and a terry inner layer. I first came across this robe at a local spa; I loved the robe so much that I took a picture of the label, and then was thrilled to find it on Amazon. It is extremely comfortable! Love the big pockets and how soft the material is; velvety soft microfiber on the outside and a lightweight terry cloth inside. I splurged purchasing it, but feel that this will last many years.
